





..
    Classes and methods

Class ambrosia_web.layout.Dimensions
================================================================================

..
   class-title


Helper class that represents the dimensions of a block








    


Constructor
-----------

.. js:class:: ambrosia_web.layout.Dimensions(x, y, width, height)



    
    :param  x: 
        the x position 
    
    :param  y: 
        the y position 
    
    :param  width: 
        the width 
    
    :param  height: 
        the height
